title: Darboy Walmart warning against kidnapping
subtitle: Darboy, Wisconsin, is the last site where human traffickers are alleged to be involved in complex schemes to kidnap random shoppers and Wal-Mart.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Darboy Walmart faced human traffickers using an unexpected menstrual period as a trick, and a nearby police officer confirmed the interaction was a "new trick" used to abduct women.
